title: account hacked please help
body: account was hacked and trying to figure out what i can do or who i have to talk to. i can not submit a ticket because obviously whomever it was changed the passwords and so forth so any help would be appreciated. trying to figure this out is driving me insane considering i have spent hundreds of dollars on this game and just feels like u get the run around with out being able to actually get anywhere. if anybody has an email or anything that could help to where i could contact someone hell even anyone that would be much appreciated. thanks

replies.body: It's okay if you cannot login to submit a ticket, we can still help!  Instead use our[ account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) or submit an email to support@riotgames.com.  It may be a bit depending on the size of the queue, but rest easy knowing we'll help as best we can to restore access.  Hang tight until then!
